channel.title: Greifing
channel.description: Ok i had no idea what greifing was and it was funny cause i filled in this guy's house with bricks, i had no idea it meant doing this. therefore i issue an apology to whoever was hurt by this and i offer to the user that was effected anything partaining to minecraft/websites/software they would like in resonable conditions. I also would like to just apologize lmao. Wont "greif" again. ;D

item.title: Greifing
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

lol owned. If you had even read the server rules, you would have understood what griefing was. If you have gotten banned, I don’t think the admins would be sympathatic with your case.
